resources.string: "Which hand do you use to brush your teeth?"
"Please check your Inbox and follow the instructions to reset your password."
"An error occurred while resetting your password."
"Your account has been created. You are now ready to brush your teeth!"
"I agree to the "%2$s" and I acknowledge the "%4$s"."
"Help us improve the accuracy of the motion sensors by sending us your brushing data anonymously. (You can edit your preferences anytime in the app settings)"
"Music during a brushing session in Coach: %1$s"
"Do you really want to delete this profile?"
"We believe that technology can help prevent oral diseases and cavities and we are turning this belief into reality."
"Colgate Connect, the logo Colgate Connect and all trademarks of Colgate Connect are the property of Colgate Connect. All Rights Reserved."
"No surface data available for this brushing."
"Brush your teeth with your Colgate Connect toothbrush and see the areas you may have neglected."
"Please connect your toothbrush to start brushing your teeth with Go!Pirate."
"Do you want to brush your teeth without your Colgate Connect toothbrush?"
"Something went wrong. Please try again later."
"Something went wrong. Please try again later."
"Your Colgate Connect toothbrush has been upgraded!"
"Press and hold the button on your toothbrush until the LED light blinks blue to make it discoverable."
"If a pop-up asks you to pair your toothbrush, Enter the pin code :"
"The connection between your toothbrush and your device was not successful. Please verify if your toothbrush is on and try again."
"Coach helps you to master brushing by showing you exactly where to brush. Practice makes perfect!"
"Brushing becomes a game: grab the pieces that you find along the way while brushing."
"New brushing data will be assigned to the profile selected above"
"Brushing more than three times a day can damage the gums."
"Do you really want to log out?"
"Uh oh, that's embarrassing… Check your network connection in order to load avatar pictures."
"Your toothbrush is not detected. Please reconnect it to complete the configuration."
"Help us improve the accuracy of the motion sensors by sending us your brushing data anonymously."
"Receive every week a complete brushing report including the most important information about your oral hygiene."
"To see your dental check-up, brush your teeth with one of the app activities."
"This check up only takes into account your brushing wihilst using the app."
"To see your dental check-up, brush your teeth with one of the app activities."
"Oops, you're not connected to the internet."
"Connect to the internet to update your brushing data."
"This toothbrush is already linked to a person."
"Would you like to link this toothbrush to %s's profile straight away?"
"Do you want to modify the settings and link this toothbrush to another person?"
"Do you want to modify the settings and link this toothbrush to your profile?"

"The settings of your toothbrush will be modified so that you can use it among all profiles.
Any brushing without the app will no longer be saved."
"You can change this sharing mode later in the settings of each of your toothbrushes."
"A new toothbrush has been detected! Who is using it?"
"Other account users can use this brush if they change the brush head. Simply choose the new user before brushing your teeth."
"If you brush your teeth without using the app, your brushing data will not be saved."
"A new toothbrush has been detected and added to your profile."

"The settings of your toothbrushes will be modified so that you can use them among all profiles.
Any brushing without the app will no longer be saved."
"You can use the toothbrush with or without the Colgate Connect app."
"Your toothbrush automatically stores your brushing data, but remember to sync it to the Colgate Connect app at least once a week to keep it updated."
"Do you wish to add a new Colgate Connect toothbrush to your profile?"
"Remember to sync your brushing to maximize your Colgate Connect experience!"
"Sync your toothbrush to save your recorded data even if you have brushed without opening the Colgate Connect app"
"Want to know if you brushed well the last few days? Sync your brushing with the Colgate Connect app."
"Remember to sync your brushing from time to time so Colgate Connect can analyze your dental health!"
"Want to know more about dental health? Touch to sync your brushing."
"Are your near your toothbrush? Touch to sync your brushing!"
"Tap to sync your brushing and update your dental report."
"Sync your brushing now to check your progress."
"How effective was your recent brushing? Sync to find out."
"Is your toothbrush nearby? Sync your brushing!"
"Sync your toothbrush to update your brushing indicators."
I don\'t know what toothbrush I have
"Put the toothbrush on the charger and tap the Start button."
"Shake your Connect M1 to activate the bluetooth pairing process, then click the Search button."
"Wait for it! The app is looking for your toothbrush."
"You can change these new parameters in your toothbrush settings."
"Check your toothbrush name, which can be found on the packaging"
"Android requires Location permission to connect any Bluetooth Low Energy device. Please enable it in the following dialog to connect your toothbrush."

"If your toothbrush is right near you, but doesn't appear here, it's maybe because it's already connected to another device.
Deactivate the bluetooth or forget the toothbrush on the other device.
You'll see the toothbrush appearing here!"
"Your toothbrush is called : \"%1$s\" You can change it in the settings!"
"Your brushing data will automatically be stored in the toothbrush. Remember to connect your brush to the app at least once a week to save your data."

"You can brush with our Coach!
However, without a Colgate Connect toothbrush, you'll miss the full Connect experience.
Hopefully, it\'s not too late to buy one right away :)"
"Get another Colgate Connect toothbrush in the store!"
"You can use the toothbrush with or without the Colgate Connect app"
"I don't have a Colgate Connect toothbrush"
"This device will no longer automatically connect to the toothbrush."
"A new update (%s) is available for your toothbrush."
"Make sure your toothbrush is on and bring it closer to your device, it will connect automatically."
"Your toothbrush needs to be updated to function properly."
"Connect to the internet to start the update."
"Please turn on the Bluetooth on your device"
"Dentists say that a 2mins brushing session twice a day decreases the risks of tooth decay."

"Dentists say that brushing your teeth twice a day decreases the risks of tooth decay.
It's harmful for your gums to brush your teeth over three times per day."

"Tooth decay can be found everywhere!
Every surface of every tooth is important, so you should aim for 100% brushed surfaces :)"
"Your profile has been created. You are now ready to brush your teeth!"
"Please tell us a little more about yourself"
"Are you really sure you want to delete your account? This operation is not reversible."
"This checkup shows your last brushing. Pay extra attention to the yellow areas as these have been neglected and have higher risk of plaque!"
"This checkup shows your brushing. Pay extra attention to the yellow areas as these have been neglected and have higher risk of plaque!"
"Before proceeding, please press your toothbrush button twice."
"You can change this link later in your toothbrush settings."
"This device is not compatible with Bluetooth Low Energy"
"Congratulations! You cumulated more than 120 brushings. It's time to renew your brushhead."
"The active profile is %1$s but you are using %2$s's toothbrush! To whom should the data be assigned?"
"Do you really want to delete these brushings? This action is irreversible."
"Want Even Cleaner Teeth? We’ve created some smart, new features to help get your oral hygiene to the next level."

"We have a coach program to help give you stronger long-term brushing habits
Coach is a 2D view that highlights the zone of the mouth to brush."
"Turn your toothbrush into a game console! Collect coins and hunt for Black Beard’s treasure!"
"Clear and valuable info about you and your brushing habits all in one place."

"Regularly clean the handle and charging base with a damp cloth.
This is especially important if your toothpaste contains baking soda or other bicarbonates or peroxide"
"To change the default brushing time head to settings and into your profile. Set the time you wish under Brushing Time"

"Place the toothbrush at a 45° angle to your teeth and make small motions from the gums towards the edge of the teeth
For your front teeth don’t forget to brush in front and behind the tooth surface"
"Congratulations! That's a perfect brushing session. All your teeth have been brushed for the required amount of time."
"Well done, your brushing session is close to perfection. Keep it up."
"You can do better. Next time you brush pay extra attention to the yellow areas. These haven't been brushed for the required amount of time."
"Plaque alert! Next time you brush pay extra attention to the yellow areas. These have been neglected."
"No surface data available for this brushing."
"Are you sure you want to cancel the update?"
"E-mail me a link to sign in"

"No need to remember a long or hard to type password. We have just sent you an email to help you log in.
Open it from your smartphone and click on the provided link to log in. But hurry, the link expires after 30 min."
"Parental consent is required to perform this action"
"You have more than 10 brushing sessions recorded on your account. Link your account to your email address or you will lose your data: you won't be able to access your account after logout."
"Secure your stats by entering your email or logging in with Facebook now."
"You will be sure to retrieve your data in any cases."
"You must agree to the terms and conditions"
"Please provide us with your parent or guardian's email address, and we'll contact him or her with next steps!"
"You have more than 10 brushing sessions recorded on your account. Link your account to your email address or you risk losing your data: you won't be able to access your account in case of logout."
"Use the Test Brushing to diagnose your brushing habits and identify areas for improvement."
"Due to a server error, the operation failed. Please try again."
"The internet connection appears to be offline."
"Something went wrong. Please try again later."
"Your account does not have an associated email. Please setup an email to your account before continuing"
"Due to a server error, the operation failed. Please try again later."
"An email allowing you to retrieve all your data will be sent to %s shortly."
"You must agree to the privacy policy"
"Enter the code you've just received by SMS and press the OK button."
"This Facebook account isn’t linked to a Colgate Connect account"
"To continue with the app, please upgrade to the latest version; We have squashed some critical bugs."
"A brand-new 3D brushing experience that guarantees 100% surface coverage."
"Do you agree to share your brushing data with your dental professional %s so your professional can provide feedback on your brushing habits?"
"Select this option to share your brushing data with your dentist/dental office, so they can have a regular monitoring."
"Here are the professionals who you can allow access to your brushing data. If your dental professional is not listed, please contact us 1-800-468-6502. Learn more."

"Here are the professionals who you can allow access to your brushing data. If your dental professional is not listed, please contact us 1-800-468-6502.
The information collected by the Colgate Connect smart toothbrushing app may help you monitor and better understand your brushing technique. The benefits of this study are to better understand toothbrushing behavior. There are no direct benefits anticipated for you as a participant."

"By stopping sharing data with this professional, you terminate the personalized Colgate Connect Pro follow-up. If you wish to resume the follow-up later, this dental professional will have to send you a Colgate Connect Pro invitation in order to access your data again.
Are you sure you want to continue?"
"Are you sure you want to quit?"
"By stopping the Colgate Connect Pro process, you wont share your data with your dental practice, and they wont be able to monitor your brushing sessions."
"Do you agree to share your brushing data with your dental professional %1$s so your professional can provide feedback on your brushing habits?"
"Please hold your toothbrush still or place it on a flat surface during setup"
"Do not move your M1 during setup"
"Start experiencing the\n future of oral care!"
"To connect your toothbrush, please activate Bluetooth on your device"
"Press the XXX button on your toothbrush"
"Shake your toothbrush to activate the bluetooth pairing process"
"Can you see a blue blink on your brush?"
"Are you trying to connect a Connect E1 toothbrush?"
"I don’t have a Colgate connected toothbrush"
"Did you know that most people only brush 40% of their teeth surface?"
"Brush your teeth like you usually do"
"Improve your brushing with our personalized coaching program"
"Switching the bluetooth off and on again usually solves connection issues."
"If your toothbrush is near you but still doesn’t appear here, it may be because it needs to be turned on, it has a low battery level, or it’s already connected to another device."
"and start brushing as you usually do!"
"Gently brush your teeth and gums as you would using a regular toothbrush"
"Stop brushing when you would normally do"
"Cleaning bristles & polishing cups help remove more plaque, stains and bacteria"
"We are analyzing your brushing to help you improve your brushing technique"
"Which hand do you hold your toothbrush in?"
"How many times a day do you brush your teeth?"
"Discover how good your brushing technique is."
"You missed a few areas. Try our brushing coach to reach 100%."
"You can do even better. Try our brushing coach so you won't miss any spot."
"There's room for improvement. Try our brushing coach so you won't miss any spot."
"No surface data available for this brushing."
"It’s like looking in the mirror, the right side of the jaw on the screen is the right side of your mouth"
"The connection with your toothbrush has been lost. Wait for it to reconnect or restart your brushing session later."
"Please update to Android 6 or above to use GoPirate."
"The harder and faster you brush might feel more effective, but brushing with this hard, sawing motion actually promotes unhealthy build up between your teeth and gums."
"Try brushing slower, focusing on one tooth at a time, and allowing the bristles to clean in between the teeth."
"Your movements were too fast when you brushed %1$s. Slow down to keep healthy teeth."
"Your movements were too fast during %1$s of your brushing. Slow down to keep healthy teeth."
"the outside surface of your front teeth"
"the inside surface of your front teeth"
"Charge/replace your toothbrush battery to perform the update."
"The toothbrush does not have enough battery"
"Only few days of battery lifetime available, get ready to replace it."
"Still few weeks of battery lifetime available assuming you use our standard AAA alkaline battery from Energizer. Other types of batteries may lead to lower battery life."
"More than 6 months of battery lifetime available assuming you use our standard AAA alkaline battery from Energizer. Other types of batteries may lead to lower battery life."
"More than 3 months of battery lifetime available assuming you use our standard AAA alkaline battery from Energizer. Other types of batteries may lead to lower battery life."
"Are you sure you want to delete %1$s?"
"You will be able to download it again later."
"Turn on your toothbrush to start your Coached brushing session"
"Use one of the connected toothbrushes to start your Coached brushing session"
"Click the button to start your manual Coached brushing session"
"You can use your Colgate Connect toothbrush with or without the app"
"Brush with Colgate Connect while the app is not open : your brushing technique is still analyzed"
"You can then synchronize your toothbrush by simply opening your App and discover new insights"
"%s tier reached. Every tooth brushing brings you %s Smiles."
"Shake your toothbrush to start your Coached brushing session"
"Please enable your internet connection to load Rewards data."
"An error occurred while loading data. Please try again later."

plurals.name: smiles_feedback_good
plurals.item: "What a nice brushing!\nYou just won %1$d Smile!"
"What a nice brushing!\nYou just won %1$d Smiles!"

resources.string: "Unfortunately you didn't win any Smiles with this brushing.\nYou need to get at least 50%% surface coverage to win Smiles."
"Congratulations %s, you completed %s challenges. Keep on going!"
"From now on every tooth brushing brings you"
"Hey, you synced %s brushings and won %s Smiles!"
"Hey, you synced %s brushings but didn't win any Smiles.\nYou need to get at least 50%% surface coverage to win Smiles."
"Start by pressing the XXX button on your toothbrush"
Look out for the flashing bluetooth symbol
Removing build up every day is key to good oral health.
Advanced Smart Sensors detect build up on your teeth
Indicator light ring illuminates to direct your brushing
"Hold the toothbrush in a horizontal position to ensure effective technique."
"Pay attention to the LED ring color while you brush your teeth"
The yellow shows you the areas you didn\'t brush
The blue shows the areas that have remaining build up. We recommend you re-brush these areas
"Brush your teeth 2 times a day with more than 80%% of surface coverage per brushing to deserve your crown!"
"Yay, you brushed your teeth 2 times a day 7 days in a row. You won %s Smiles!"
"How would you rate your current oral care routine?"
"How often do you suffer with gum or tooth sensitivity?"
"What would you most like to work on today?"
"You must have an electric toothbrush connected to your device to test the program"

"Hold your toothbrush at 45 degree angle toward the gum line.
Follow the instructions to evaluate and improve your technique."
"Please enable internet access to create your account"
"Brush your molars outer surface and keep the correct angle for 20 sec"
"Tilt your toothbrush vertically for the inner front teeth surface"
"That’s it! You can now exit the Test your Angles activity."

"Brushing your teeth too quickly can damage your gums.
Follow the instructions to evaluate and improve your technique"

plurals.name: earning_points_subtitle
plurals.item: "You earn %1$d point every time you brush."
"You earn %1$d points every time you brush."

resources.string:
You can earn points by brushing your teeth with our App. The points earned are shown on your home page.

At any time you can use your points in our shop to buy refills for you toothbrush or other products for oral care.

"The best smiles are more than a look, they're a feeling. And we believe that brushing your teeth should make you feel great. That's why we created hum; a brush that's all about making it easier to brush better."
"start brushing normally and turn your brush off when done."
"When you’re done, just turn off the brush."
"Something went wrong. Please try again later."
"To connect your toothbrush, please activate Bluetooth on your device"
"Press the power button or shake your toothbrush if it’s already on."
"Firmware version: %1$s Bootloader version: %2$d Flash file: %3$s Flash file version: %4$s"
"The connection with your toothbrush has been lost. Wait for it to reconnect or restart your brushing session later"
"Android requires Location permission to connect any Bluetooth Low Energy device. Please enable it in the following dialog to connect your toothbrush."
"Android requires activated Location to connect any Bluetooth Low Energy device. Please turn it on in the following dialog to connect your toothbrush."
"most people miss 60% of their teeth surface, let’s see how you did."
"we found a brush! is it yours?"
"Do you see the blue light blinking on your brush?"
"Your brush needs to charge for 24 hours prior to using it for the first time."
"We detected the Colgate Connect toothbrush. To optimise your brushing experience we recommend you switch to the Colgate Connect app"
"If your toothbrush is near but doesn’t appear here, it may be because:"
"• it’s already connected to another device"
"Turn it on, deactivate the bluetooth or forget the toothbrush on the other device."
"You should now see your toothbrush in the list!"
"I brush 2 minutes, at least 2 times a day"
"I brush 2 minutes, at least 2 times a day"
"I brush 2 minutes, at least 2 times a day"
